title: tHis book is intituled confessio amantis, that is to saye in englysshe the confessyon of the louer maad and compyled by Iohan Gower squyer ...
author: Gower, John, 1325?-1408.
publicationDate: and fynysshed the ij day of Septembre the fyrst yere of the regne of Kyng Richard the thyrd, [i.e. 1483] the yere of our lord a thousand, CCCC, lxxxxiij [sic]]
